articles.content: Baby Driver star Ansel Elgort has denied a sexual assault allegation against him on Instagram.A woman, who identified herself only as Gabby, accused US actor Elgort of sexually assaulting her in 2014… [+1782 chars]

articles.title: 'Deeply sorry': Director apologises after Sydney Film Festival racism outcry - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Little Woman actor and first-time director Eliza Scanlen has deleted a scene from a short film that won a best director prize.
articles.content:
"Beyond the racism and violence within the film, editing a film AFTER IT HAS WON is rigging the system," she wrote on Twitter. "It's dishonest and unfair to the other films in consideration."
